attributes.action: ReOpen the gyms in UK during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: This is not a new topic with over 500,000 people singing the previous petition. However government has closed the gyms yet again  with people being able to use outside gyms , exercise places and Personal training outside to be open. These costs a lot of money and not feasible for most people. In order to keep our minds and bodies engaged to good health we need immediate opening of gyms.
attributes.background: The percentage of covid cases in gyms has been very low and to keep morale and fitness up during lockdown we need have these facilities open.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
